column1: Smoque BBQ////I worked from home yesterday and decided to take a field trip over to Smoque with my manfriend.  I made a huge mistake by not taking the expressway.  We drove through God's country to get there...45 minutes later we finally arrived.  The wonderful aroma of
column4: hit me as we walked in the door.  I went with the pulled pork
column5: and B had the St. Louis ribs.  Both of us had mac and cheese on the side and B also got fries.  Everything was delicious
column6: but the real winners were the pulled pork and the mac and cheese.
